Because there's more to life

...than policing our bodies. There's more to life than chasing beauty standards. There's more to life than chasing body privilege. And there are too many people who profit from all of it.


[A cupcake has no moral value]

VOICES

ABOUT ME

My name is Dylan, and I started BODNON because I was tired of all of the nonsense our culture sustains when it comes to bodies. My own body is white, cis, hetero, able, and thin, and as a result I live with many, many layers of privilege. I have beneffited, in ways seen and unseen, from the injustices of our society and from our culture's obsession with valuing and devaluing bodies. My goal with BODNON is to be a voice of dissent from within this culture, and to boost the voices of those who are actively dismantling it, often from positions of less privilege than my own. There is no wrong way to have a body, and any suggestion otherwise is just body nonsense.
